item.title: US cities should be military training grounds, Trump tells generals
item.description: The US president warned military leaders of a "war from within", and signals they will be tasked with intervening.

item.title: Unpicking Trump's Gaza peace plan map
item.description: BBC Verify analyses President Trump’s peace plan for Gaza and what it means on the ground.

item.title: Chinese woman convicted after 'world's biggest' bitcoin seizure
item.description: UK police seized crypto worth over £5bn from Zhimin Qian, who was known as 'the goddess of wealth'.

item.title: South Africa's top diplomat in France found dead near Paris hotel
item.description: The circumstances around Nathi Mthethwa's death are being investigated by the French authorities.

item.title: Bowen: Momentum is the strength of Trump's Gaza plan, but lack of detail is its weakness
item.description: The plan is a significant moment - but it lacks the nuts and bolts that determine whether diplomatic agreements hold together, or don't.
